query:
UPDATE daily_stats ds
            SET	tasks_count = LEAST(tasks_count + $1, $2),
                tasks_count_bonus = tasks_count_bonus + (LEAST(tasks_count + $1, $2) - tasks_count)
        FROM users u
        WHERE
            ds.user_id = u.id
        	AND ds.status = 'OnGoing'
            AND ds.day = CURRENT_DATE
            AND ds.tasks_count < $2
